verses.greek: Ἰδὼν δὲ τοὺς ὄχλους ἀνέβη εἰς τὸ ὄρος· καὶ καθίσαντος αὐτοῦ προσῆλθαν αὐτῷ οἱ μαθηταὶ αὐτοῦ·
verses.english: Seeing the crowds, he went up on the mountain, and when he sat down, his disciples came to him.
verses.wedau: Yesu i inana rava anatapuhi, i nae au dobuna. Ma i maꞌae, ana tauvotaghotagho hi neꞌi awarina.

verses.greek: καὶ ἀνοίξας τὸ στόμα αὐτοῦ ἐδίδασκεν αὐτοὺς λέγων·
verses.english: And he opened his mouth and taught them, saying:
verses.wedau: Ma Yesu i ponana i wana-tawaneꞌi ma i viharaharamana hita, i riwa ipa:

verses.greek: Μακάριοι οἱ πτωχοὶ τῷ πνεύματι, ὅτι αὐτῶν ἐστιν ἡ βασιλεία τῶν οὐρανῶν.
verses.english: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
verses.wedau: Rava hi nuwaboyei, hita aruwa-apoapoena hi vovovoi, yamna God ana vibadana vouna hita.

verses.greek: μακάριοι οἱ πενθοῦντες, ὅτι αὐτοὶ παρακληθήσονται.
verses.english: Blessed are those who mourn, for they shall be comforted.
verses.wedau: Rava hi nuwaboyei, hita hi nuwanuwaboyei, yamna hita hi paꞌini.

verses.greek: μακάριοι οἱ πραεῖς, ὅτι αὐτοὶ κληρονομήσουσιν τὴν γῆν.
verses.english: Blessed are the meek, for they shall inherit the earth.
verses.wedau: Rava hi nuwaboyei, hita hi vivivireinei, yamna hita hi dobuna ana vouna.

verses.greek: μακάριοι οἱ πεινῶντες καὶ διψῶντες τὴν δικαιοσύνην, ὅτι αὐτοὶ χορτασθήσονται.
verses.english: Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness, for they shall be satisfied.
verses.wedau: Rava hi nuwaboyei, hita hi kapaꞌukapaꞌu ma tawayatawaya God ana vovonana awarina, yamna hita hi yawahana.

verses.greek: μακάριοι οἱ ἐλεήμονες, ὅτι αὐτοὶ ἐλεηθήσονται.
verses.english: Blessed are the merciful, for they shall receive mercy.
verses.wedau: Rava hi nuwaboyei, hita hi nuwaboyei ana hita, yamna hita hi nuwaboyei ana vouna.

verses.greek: μακάριοι οἱ καθαροὶ τῇ καρδίᾳ, ὅτι αὐτοὶ τὸν Θεὸν ὄψονται.
verses.english: Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God.
verses.wedau: Rava hi nuwaboyei, hita hi vivivireina ahi urana, yamna hita hi God ina inana.

verses.greek: μακάριοι οἱ εἰρηνοποιοί, ὅτι αὐτοὶ υἱοὶ Θεοῦ κληθήσονται.
verses.english: Blessed are the peacemakers, for they shall be called sons of God.
verses.wedau: Rava hi nuwaboyei, hita hi vovonana ahi yaruhi, yamna hita hi God ana natuna ina ghorehi.

verses.greek: μακάριοι οἱ δεδιωγμένοι ἕνεκεν δικαιοσύνης, ὅτι αὐτῶν ἐστιν ἡ βασιλεία τῶν οὐρανῶν.
verses.english: Blessed are those who are persecuted for righteousness' sake, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
verses.wedau: Rava hi nuwaboyei, hita hi rau-dadani God ana vovonana awarina, yamna God ana vibadana vouna hita.

verses.greek: μακάριοί ἐστε ὅταν ὀνειδίσωσιν ὑμᾶς καὶ διώξωσιν καὶ εἴπωσιν πᾶν πονηρὸν καθ' ὑμῶν ψευδόμενοι ἕνεκεν ἐμοῦ.
verses.english: Blessed are you when others revile you and persecute you and utter all kinds of evil against you falsely on my account.
verses.wedau: Rava ami nuwaboyei, maranaina rava hi ami rau-gamopotahi ma hi ami rau-dadanihi ma hi ami apoapoe ina riwehi, tau awarina.

verses.greek: χαίρετε καὶ ἀγαλλιᾶσθε, ὅτι ὁ μισθὸς ὑμῶν πολὺς ἐν τοῖς οὐρανοῖς· οὕτως γὰρ ἐδίωξαν τοὺς προφήτας τοὺς πρὸ ὑμῶν.
verses.english: Rejoice and be glad, for your reward is great in heaven, for so they persecuted the prophets who were before you.
verses.wedau: Ami nuwaboyei ma ami tumaghanei, yamna ami puyona i ghe vavahagha au marei. Yamna aubaina hi peroveta hita rau-dadanihi, hita ami awarina hi maꞌae.
